summary: This is a grand jury subpoena issued by the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York on July 6, 2019, commanding an unnamed recipient to appear before a grand jury on July 22, 2019, to testify and produce documents related to alleged violations of federal sex trafficking and conspiracy statutes. The document includes a cover letter requesting confidentiality and an attached 'Advice of Rights' form.

persons.name: Geoffrey S. Berman
persons.context: Issued the grand jury subpoena as the United States Attorney for the Southern District of New York.

events.title: Grand Jury Appearance
events.description: The unnamed subpoena recipient is commanded to appear before a federal grand jury at the United States Courthouse in Manhattan to testify and produce documents.

events.title: Subpoena Issued
events.description: The grand jury subpoena is issued by the U.S. Attorney's Office, initiating a formal demand for testimony and documents.

locations: Silvio J. Mollo Building, One Saint Andrew's Plaza, New York, New York 10007
United States Courthouse, 40 Foley Square, Room 220, Borough of Manhattan, City of New York, New York
keyFacts: The subpoena is issued in connection with an investigation into alleged violations of 18 U.S.C. §§ 1591 (sex trafficking), 2421, 2422, 2423 (transportation for prostitution/illegal sexual activity), and 371 (conspiracy).
The U.S. Attorney's Office requests the recipient voluntarily refrain from disclosing the existence of the subpoena to preserve the confidentiality of the investigation.
The recipient is commanded to appear on July 22, 2019, at 10:00 a.m. at the federal courthouse in Manhattan.
The attached 'Advice of Rights' informs the recipient of their right against self-incrimination and right to counsel.
The document is dated July 6, 2019, indicating active federal investigation into sex trafficking crimes at that time.
